author: David Von Drehle
title: I Probably Have A 'Mild To Moderate' Case Of COVID-19. I Don't Think I Could Survive Worse
description: Of course, I don't know for sure that I have COVID-19, because there is no testing where I live.
content: Of course, I dont know for sure that I have covid-19, because there is no testing where I live. People talk about testing on TV all day long. Usually, Im listening through a scrim of fitful sleep. Its like being stuck in the Loch Ness Monster programming on b… [+4387 chars]
